Accessibility.definition: Problems related to phone accessibility features or those solvable through accessibility settings, including visual or auditory assistance, accessibility apps, or shortcut failures.

Camera.definition: Issues involving the device camera usage, photo/video capture, or problems such as blurry or corrupted images.

Wi-Fi Connectivity.definition: Any issues related to the network, including Wi-Fi connectivity, configuration doubts, disconnections, or slow speeds.

Bluetooth.definition: Problems involving Bluetooth device pairing, connectivity, or stability.

Privacy & Permissions.definition: Issues involving app permission management, privacy settings, or measures taken to protect user privacy/data before an attack occurs. Includes concerns about data protection and user privacy.

Malware.definition: Any issues caused by malicious software, or user suspicions about unknown or potentially harmful apps.

Security.definition: Problems where system protection fails, the device is under attack, remotely managed/locked, subject to security restrictions, hacked accounts, or other consequences of system intrusion.

Google Play Services.definition: Problems related to Google Play Services, including failed system updates, download errors, or related malfunctions.

Backup & Restore.definition: Problems related to device data backup, data restoration, or issues involving factory reset.

Settings.definition: Issues where the user is dissatisfied with interface icons or other non-functional aspects (such as layout or icon placement), or encounters problems when making personalized adjustments or changes to settings. Only personalized adjustments count, not all problems solvable via system settings.

Notifications.definition: Issues related to notification functionality but not the content of the notifications themselves, or cases where the user receives abnormal or unknown notifications, such as mis-delivered notifications or misconfigured notification settings.

Find My Device.definition: Malfunctions or issues related to the "Find My Device" feature.

GPS.definition: Any GPS-related problems, including inaccurate positioning or location errors.

Location.definition: Issues involving all general location services and settings.

Device Protection.group: Device Protection / Forgot PIN, Pattern, Passcode / Syncing
Device Protection.definition: Device protection issues before an actual attack occurs, including user concerns about mobile security and Factory Reset Protection (FRP)-related problems.

Forgot PIN, Pattern, Passcode.group: Device Protection / Forgot PIN, Pattern, Passcode / Syncing
Forgot PIN, Pattern, Passcode.definition: Problems caused by the user forgetting their phone unlock method (PIN, pattern, or passcode).

Syncing.group: Device Protection / Forgot PIN, Pattern, Passcode / Syncing
Syncing.definition: Errors in data synchronization between devices or Google account services.

Battery.definition: Problems related to the battery, including battery life, charging faults, or abnormal power consumption suspected to be battery-related.

Performance.definition: Problems with degraded device responsiveness or slowness, such as lagging, delayed input, or unresponsive apps.

Stability.definition: Problems involving unexpected system crashes, repeated restarts, or other abnormal behaviors for unknown reasons, as well as overheating or other system stability issues.

Other.definition: Issues not included in the above categories, such as storage problems, physical device damage, or vendor/merchant-related issues.
